These are mix of savings and investment accounts. Definitely investment accounts will give you higher return for higher risk. Do you require your capital to be protected?

Yes  I understand. There is no need to be capital guaranteed. But of course  I‚Äôm expecting a higher return if going for non-capital guaranteed investment. Let‚Äôs say capital guaranteed makes 3-3.5%  non-capital guaranteed makes 3.5-4%. If it‚Äôs just an extra 0.5%  I wouldn‚Äôt take the risk  because not really worth it.
